title: Neo PAX Sivir and Epic Capsules

replies.body:
I'm an owner of OG Grey Warwick and Medieval Twitch skins and i'm just wondering why aren't these skins getting special loading screen borders for our OG skins? The same was done for championship riven and now for pax sivir right? So why not these two skins?
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Because you're a Kayle one trick

Read more about it here! <no additional content or links to be found>

ggez

GOTCHA! 

... and by that I mean the link to the gates of nowhere has been removed. 

ggwp!
Very glad to hear that current owners of PAX Sivir are getting Neo PAX for free. Plus I can't wait to try out the Loading Screen border. :D
oh my god you lucky b...
How come medieval twitch and grey warwick don't get the special loading borders, arnt they rare skins as well?

"Owners of the original PAX Sivir skin will automatically receive Neo PAX Sivir and a special loading screen border for their OG skin. The original PAX Sivir will NOT be given away, added to loot, or made available again." 

Ok, you do this for pax sivir AND championship riven but what about OG Medieval Twitch owners? Can we get some kind of recognition for receiving Medieval Twitch and Grey WW the original way? Definitely not fair...
I second this, I think rito forgot about the inconsistency
*T H I C C*
All these "chances" of getting things are starting to resemble something a lot like gambling. Hope Rito knows you need a licence for that in future >_<

It's actually not TECHNICALLY gambling because every box gives out rewards. for it to be gambling, there needs to be a chance of getting nothing at all. That's how all the loot box/gacha games get around the law.

Disgusting. As an owner of OG PAX Sivir I'm disgusted that you're re-releasing it even if it has a slight colour variant and different name you're still devaluing the current skin we already own. Absolutely appalling.
Stop whining you got the Pax sivir skin and get this for free. I hate these uppity players, which describes the majority of people who own PAX skins, they should release all those skins.

> [{quoted}](name=illidanisdead,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=fX2V85FO,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2017-09-01T12:00:23.534+0000)
>
> Stop whining you got the Pax sivir skin and get this for free. I hate these uppity players, which describes the majority of people who own PAX skins, they should release all those skins.

Lol, we had to attend a PAX event to get said skin so it's extremely devalued when it's basically re-released anyway, you'd feel the same if you were an OG player who has supported Riot for years (pax 11' for sivir) so before you comment, learn some facts that we deserve to be mad.

> [{quoted}](name=Sesilan,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=fX2V85FO,comment-id=000400010000,timestamp=2017-09-02T09:02:20.283+0000)
>
> Lol, we had to attend a PAX event to get said skin so it's extremely devalued when it's basically re-released anyway, you'd feel the same if you were an OG player who has supported Riot for years (pax 11' for sivir) so before you comment, learn some facts that we deserve to be mad.

Okay so you attended that one event, what about the rest of us, who couldn't who for whatever reason were unable to get to this event. I've been with league of legends from season 3, while I haven't been with Riot for as long as these so called "OG players" I can say without a doubt, I have supported riot more than all of you could. In my opinion it's not fair that when there are people willing to support Riot way more than these so called OG players ever would, in terms of spending money buying skins etc. I have every skin that Riot has released other than those which you cannot purchase, so it gets on my nerves seeing some one, because they attended a one off event whine about other people getting a skin which is similar not even the same skin they have, which they would also be getting free of charge with a border.

> [{quoted}](name=illidanisdead,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=fX2V85FO,comment-id=0004000100000000,timestamp=2017-09-05T09:21:28.470+0000)
>
> Okay so you attended that one event, what about the rest of us, who couldn't who for whatever reason were unable to get to this event. I've been with league of legends from season 3, while I haven't been with Riot for as long as these so called "OG players" I can say without a doubt, I have supported riot more than all of you could. In my opinion it's not fair that when there are people willing to support Riot way more than these so called OG players ever would, in terms of spending money buying skins etc. I have every skin that Riot has released other than those which you cannot purchase, so it gets on my nerves seeing some one, because they attended a one off event whine about other people getting a skin which is similar not even the same skin they have, which they would also be getting free of charge with a border.

I have also purchased EVERY skin available including the unobtainable ones.

This is almost like saying "chromas make the original skin less of value." I think if you have the OG skin people will probably recognise you more often for having that skin. Hundreds of people had no idea what the original championship riven was worth until they re-released it in a slightly different way.

> [{quoted}](name=common pheasant,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=fX2V85FO,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-08-09T02:34:36.987+0000)
>
> This is almost like saying "chromas make the original skin less of value." I think if you have the OG skin people will probably recognise you more often for having that skin. Hundreds of people had no idea what the original championship riven was worth until they re-released it in a slightly different way.


Chromas are just recolours of the skin you own not a complete separate skin mimicking a skin we had to go to an event to obtain and is now completely unobtainable since they removed all code skins pre-2015
what will be the price of the five capsule bundle
When Will the Epic Capsules be released?

can people who are whinging about "I have medieval twitch and grey warwick, pax sivir and champ riven gets special og features, where's mine wah wah wah". calm the fk down people, they dont do these things all at once. also note that black alistar and king rammus skin owners havnt had any special treatment yet being way more rarer skins than grey warwick and medieval twitch.
Is the border for PAX Sivir owners on the PAX Sivir skin or Neo Pax Sivir?
Neo PAX Sivir, That shows that when they use the skin, the own the original aswell
Will this happen to PAX Jax and PAX TF. As a TF main, I really hope so
{{champion:201}}
